page.title: 07A Cottage Industry Pottery
page.content:
A HOME POTTERY INDUSTRY
Mr and Mrs Bickford live in an old cottage in Fore Street Bradninch. Grid ref.999041. Mrs Bickford is a housewife and her husband is a Town planner. They have two children, Amy and Jacob. At one time Mr and Mrs Bickford used to make and sell pottery. They stopped when they had small children. Mr Bickford still makes pots as a hobby and sells a few of them. Now they are hoping to begin a small business again. The home is made up of three storey's. In the top storey Mr Bickford has a small room where he has a foot_driven potters wheel and keeps his pots. He fires them in a kiln in the kitchen. He stores his clay in a cupboard under the stairs. The house has a lot of decorated pots and plates.
